Description: Ladies Ecclissi Sterling Small Size 6 5/8" Wristwatch W/Diamond Accents You Are Bidding On:  Ladies Ecclissi Sterling Small Size 6 5/8" Wristwatch W/Diamond Accents- This is a very nice Sterling Silver Ecclissi Wristwatch that we put a new battery in and is keeping good time. This Pre-Owned Vintage Wristwatch is in very nice condition and shows only light wear. **Please note that we sell all of our Watches As/Is, No Warranty. The Case has a rectangular shape with a Row of 7 Diamonds above the 12 & below the 6. The Dial is White with the center a light pinkish color. There are Silver Arabic Numbers on the 12, 3, 6 & 9 hours with slash marks for the other hours. There is also a second hand. The Case is approximately 17mm Wide, the Band is 1/2" Wide. The Band is stamped with the Ecclissi Hallmark & 925 China. **The Back Of The Case Is Stamped:  Ecclissi Sterling Silver 32375  SR521SW  Stainless Steel Back Sterling Silver Case Japan Quartz Movement Moisture Resistant.  NICE!!  SEE PICTURES!!FLAT RATE SHIPPING & HANDLING IN THE CONTINENTAL US IS FREE CONDITION:  This item was previously owned and used. There is typical markings/wear from use. Please view all photos and read entire description prior to purchasing. THANKS FOR LOOKING!GOOD LUCK! ABOUT US For over 70 years now, Arthur Yates and Son Jewelers has been a full-service jeweler specializing in GIA-Certified Diamonds and pre-owned Rolex watches. We are also committed to providing the best value in fine estate jewelry, estate diamond engagement rings, and quality jewelry and watch repairs. From our humble beginnings as a simple watchmaker with just one showcase in 1947, Arthur Yates has always been a trusted tradition in South Tampa. Over the next 50 years, we outgrew five locations between Henderson Blvd. and Plant High School. Throughout this period we have maintained a standard of outstanding personal service coupled with unwavering integrity. Today, the founding father's two sons Ron and David Yates, are carrying on the family tradition of old-fashioned customer service. Now, as always, you can count on Arthur Yates & Son Jewelers for all of your fine jewelry needs.
Title: Ladies Ecclissi Sterling Small Size 6 5/8" Wristwatch W/Diamond Accents

ReturnPolicy.Description: Please contact us within 14 days after receiving the item if you are not satisfied. The return shipping will be at the buyer's expense, and a refund will be processed upon receipt of the returned item. All items are sold AS IS.
